metadata.title: CVE-2023-29543 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An attacker could have caused memory corruption and a potentiallyexploitable use-after-free of a pointer in a global object's debuggervector. This vulnerability affects Firefox for Android < 112, Firefox <112, and Focus for Android < 112.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
